sentence.Network_en: This open letter is to rebut the argument of abstractionism.
sentence.Network_cn: 这封公开信是反驳抽象派论点的.

sentence.Network_en: Cubism , Abstractionism, and Pop art have all been epochs in the postrealistic era.
sentence.Network_cn: 立体派 、 抽象派以及通俗派艺术都是出现在后现实主义时期内的重要事件.

sentence.Network_en: But ethics without practical application only lead to the sterile formalism and abstractionism of scholastic thought.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是,拟订道德标准而不付诸实施,只会导致毫无结果的形式主义和学究气十足的抽象思想.

PerfectNetExp.abs: abstraction 提取abstractionism 抽象派艺术abstractionist 抽象派艺术家
的抽象主义(Abstractionism)艺术。从这时起,抽象艺术某种...,需要主观分析才能找到立体的内容。还有以康定斯基为代表的抽象主义。这派...也只有四至五年。在这一.

means.word_mean: 1. an abstract genre of art; artistic content depends on internal form rather than pictorial representation
2. a representation having no reference to concrete objects or specific examples
